I craft tools for people at work.

Heya, I'm Zinzy, and I've been yelling at Internet clouds since 1997. With 16 years at the intersection of research, design, leadership, and strategy, I currently serve as Design Manager of Leeruniek.

Writing

I’m an IndieWeb enthusiast, and advocate for creativity on the Internet. This space contains a growing collection of things written for public consumption.
